Module com.example._50zo
Package com.example._50zo.model

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
com.example._50zo.model.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
Represents the deck of cards used in the Game50.

This class manages a stack of Card objects that can be shuffled, drawn, or refilled from the table. It also supports adding cards back to the bottom of the deck, maintaining the gameâ€™s flow when the deck runs out.

    • initializeDeck

      private void initializeDeck()
      Initializes the deck with cards based on the values.

    • getCardValue

      private String getCardValue(String name)
      Returns the corresponding display value of a card based on its name. For example, cards ending in "1" are labeled "A", and those ending in "J", "Q", or "K" correspond to face cards.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the card from CardEnum
      Returns:
      the value symbol (e.g., "A", "2", "10", "K") or null if not found

    • takeCard

      public Card takeCard()
      Takes a card from the top of the deck.
      Returns:
      the card from the top of the deck
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the deck is empty

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Shuffles the deck of cards randomly.

      This method uses Collections.shuffle(List) to reorder the elements in deckOfCards in a random sequence, ensuring a fair and unpredictable distribution of cards.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the deck is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the deck is empty, false otherwise

    • refillFromTable

      public void refillFromTable(List<Card> cardsFromTable)
      Refills the deck from the table (except the last card).
      Parameters:
      cardsFromTable - the list of cards retrieved from the table to refill the deck

    • addAllToBottom

      public void addAllToBottom(List<Card> cards)
      Adds a list of cards to the bottom of the deck, preserving their order. The last card in the list becomes the bottommost card in the deck.
      Parameters:
      cards - the list of cards to be added to the bottom of the deck
